title: Story behind your league names?
body:
In all the games I’ve always used BloodyBlades but after playing league for a while I’ve chosen the name Here to Troll.

Story behind this one is that I’m not a very good league player but I do try lol. Throughout my games I’m usually called a Troll and some person was very toxic in the game and was just telling the enemy players to ignore me because I was just “Here To Troll” so I decided to adopt the name and I’ve been Here to Troll ever since lol
